channel.title: App-per-VM Hypervisor Type
channel.description:
Type 1 (bare-metal) hypervisors should be used for minimalism, reduced attack surface, and better performance.
seL4 Microkernel provides [libsel4vm](https://docs.sel4.systems/projects/virtualization/docs/libsel4vm.html), which fits well with this design.
For Linux kernel we can use [Xen hypervisor](https://xenproject.org/projects/hypervisor/).
Note: KVM is not true hypervisor type 1, check comparison of [KVM vs Xen](https://www.qubes-os.org/attachment/doc/arch-spec-0.3.pdf).
